data.text: @henrymance Wanted to repay him for Italian holiday..he probably had videos of his stay

@henrymance Our world stares into the abyss. For the first time since Hitler we face an evil entity that could destroy us all. That evil is Putin. Chechnya, Georgia, Syria and Ukraine have suffered unimaginable horror because of this monster. 
He must be stopped, he must be returned to Hell.
@henrymance And not any old Lord. He’s Lord Lebedev of Hampton and SIBERIA. Did no one think that the latter was a bit weird…?

@andrewsduncan1 @henrymance Trousering lord knows how much in an undisclosed Panamanian shell accounts.  Business as usual within the Johnson Administration, where self serving lies and duplicity are the twin pillars that ripple through this corrupt cabinet like Blackpool through a stick of rock.
@henrymance @Sathnam exactly. Why? what was the quid pro quo? A massive non-entity whose only purpose was to give Tatler rear-end page filling celeb snaps
@henrymance @Dr_D_Robertson In 21st century,  these titles should only be given to those who make a difference to society but must EXCLUDE those who & whose families have bad past connections.
@henrymance If he has not attended the Lords since his maiden speech and continues to stay away, then his peers (yes, ...) can at least eject him come July. https://t.co/W9adrD1Nea
@henrymance @Dr_D_Robertson Seems he's doing the same with knighthood too. Has The Clown given any honest people such freebies.
@henrymance Payback for those Umbrian holidays but what else though?
